Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
ad approval taking longer than usual

The ad approval process usually takes between 1-2 business days. However, if it's taking longer, it might be due to a verification issue or other factors. If your account is new and not yet verified, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –

- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number

Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out.
